Please note This kernel is for practice purposes only. ngf 4 x 8 x 8 state size. h_el One sided label smoothing Helps preventing the discriminator from overpowering the generator adding penalty when the discriminator is too confident Train the discriminator Train the generator Generator Loss function This is a customized loss function the first term is the regular cross entropy loss The second term is feature matching loss this measure the distance between the real and generated images statistics by comparing intermediate layers activations The third term is L1 distance between the generated and real images this is helpful for the conditional case because it links the embedding feature vector directly to certain pixel values. 2 inplace True based on https github. com ashual Text to Image Synthesis Datasets used in this kernel are same as the datasets used in the above git repository. ngf 2 x 16 x 16 state size. num_channels x 64 x 64 projected_embed self.
